Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails, and review the weekly goals to prepare for the brainstorming session.

Participate in a brainstorming session with the team, including @ldes-1 (Lead Game Designer), @uiux-1 (UI/UX Designer), and @ndes-1 (Narrative Designer) to define key user interaction features for the game.
Document the key user interaction features discussed in the brainstorming session and share them with the team.
Review feedback on existing UI elements with @uiux-1 and clarify any uncertainties regarding the new UI.
Begin creating wireframes for the new UI elements based on the feedback collected.
Wrap up by saving work on the wireframes and preparing for the next day.
